level.text: Each nurse aide training program shall maintain resources, facilities, and services which are adequate to accommodate the training program and shall include, but are not limited to:
Adequate temperature controls in each training facility;
Clean and safe conditions of the facility’s premises;
Adequate space to accommodate all students;
Adequate lighting in each facility; and
Sufficient and adequate equipment for the program’s needs including audio-visual equipment and equipment needed for simulating resident care.
Each classroom, conference room, laboratory, and office shall be adequate to meet the needs of the nurse aide training program.

If there are cooperative agreements with agencies, each nurse aide training program shall develop the agreement in writing in conjunction with the cooperating agencies and maintain copies of the agreement in its records.
